title: Analysis of Sociological Data
description: Students test their own sociological research hypotheses using data from recent American and international social surveys and state-of-the-art computer software. Application of classical scientific method, interpretation of statistical results, and clear presentation of research findings. Prerequisites: CSS 2 or SOCI 60 or SOCL 60 and upper-division standing. Will not receive credit for SOCI 109 and SOCA 109.
